channel.title: How can i make an npc heal itself?
channel.description: Ok so i want to make an npc heal, like the saradomin godsword spec, except it heals 75% of of the hit, like lets say the npc hits a 50, and it heals 37.5 hp (75%) or lets say 150% of the hit (it hits a 50, 87.5 hp)

item.title: How can i make an npc heal itself?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

were can i find this?

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make an npc heal itself?
item.dc:creator: @Shilo_Village Shilo Village
item.description:
@Shilo_Village wrote:

drubrkletern:

Ok so i want to make an npc heal, like the saradomin godsword spec, except it heals 75% of of the hit, like lets say the npc hits a 50, and it heals 37.5 hp (75%) or lets say 150% of the hit (it hits a 50, 87.5 hp)

This code may need some conversion, but youâ€™ll get the idea.

double healz = hit * 0.75; int heal = (int) healz; if((npc.health + heal) >= npc.maxHealth) { npc.health = npc.maxHealth; return; } npc.health += heal;

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make an npc heal itself?
